name: Leave in lieu
description:
Work let your people make candys.

Relax let your people convert candys to scores.

Relax Strike let your people convert candys to more scores.

Balance their work and relax. Or you want let them work continuously?

Be sure you archieve the goal before 12/31 every year.

My bilibili Channel:https://space.bilibili.com/5201566

My youtube Channel:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWBoCbkSkOntU4qVZ1A0Zcg
